Question: This person was approached by political groups from both ends of the spectrum after his aeronautical career.
Hints: This person attended Blume High School and took flying lessons at the county airport.
On March 22, 1956, this person was in a Boeing B-29 Superfortress, which was to air-drop a Douglas D-558-2 Skyrocket.
This person thought they had a strong engineering division, plus they were in financial difficulty.
